description: Metals recovery including retorting, smelting, chemical, etc.
Other recovery or reclamation for reuse including acid regeneration, organics recovery, etc. (specify in comments)
Energy recovery at this site – used as fuel (includes on-site fuel blending before energy recovery; report only this code)
Fuel blending prior to energy recovery at another site (waste generated on-site or received from off-site)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site
description: Incineration - thermal destruction other than use as a fuel (includes any preparation prior to burning)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site
description: Chemical treatment (reduction/destruction/oxidation/precipitation); do not include immediate treatment in an exempt wastewater treatment unit with discharge to a NPDES-POTW (unless required by State)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site
description: Biological treatment; do not include immediate treatment in an exempted wastewater treatment unit with discharge to a NPDES-POTW (unless required by State)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site
description: Physical treatment only (adsorption/absorption/separation/stripping/dewatering); do not include immediate treatment in an exempted wastewater treatment unit with discharge to a NPDES-POTW (unless required by State)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site
description: Stabilization prior to land disposal at another site (encapsulation/stabilization/fixation)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site
description: Combination of chemical, biological, and/or physical treatment; do not include immediate treatment in an exempted wastewater treatment unit with discharge to a NPDES-POTW (unless required by State)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site

description: Evaporation (as the major component of treatment; not reportable as H070, H081, H100 or H120)

category: Destruction or Treatment Prior to Disposal at Another Site
description: Other treatment that does not include onsite disposal (specify in comments)
Land treatment or application (to include any prior treatment and/or stabilization)
Landfill or surface impoundment that will be closed as landfill (to include prior treatment and/or stabilization)
Deepwell or underground injection (with or without treatment; this waste was counted as hazardous waste)
Discharge to sewer/POTW or NPDES(with prior storage – with or without treatment)

The site receiving this waste stored/bulked and transferred the waste with no treatment or recovery (H010-H129), fuel blending (H061), or disposal (H131-H135) at that receiving site. Do not use this code on GM Form in Section 1 - Item D or in Section 2.
